overview:
## Discussion

The signposter uses a signpost ID to pair the beginning and the end of a signposted interval, which is necessary because multiple intervals with the same configuration and scope can be in-flight simultaneously. If only one interval with a specific configuration can execute at any particular time, pass [doc://com.apple.os/documentation/os/OSSignpostID/exclusive] as the `id` parameter. Otherwise, use the [doc://com.apple.os/documentation/os/OSSignposter/makeSignpostID()] and [doc://com.apple.os/documentation/os/OSSignposter/makeSignpostID(from:)] methods to generate a signpost identifier, as the following example shows:
